languages.text: Найденный корабль полнился несметными богатствами имперских колонистов, которым было суждено погибнуть, так и не добравшись до новых земель.

traits.locale_text: Найденный корабль полнился несметными богатствами имперских колонистов, которым было суждено погибнуть, так и не добравшись до новых земель.

languages.text: The discovered ship was laden with the incalculable riches of Imperial colonists, who were doomed to die before they ever reached the new lands they sought.
languages.original_text: Найденный корабль полнился несметными богатствами имперских колонистов, которым было суждено погибнуть, так и не добравшись до новых земель.

traits.locale_text: The discovered ship was laden with the incalculable riches of Imperial colonists, who were doomed to die before they ever reached the new lands they sought.
The discovered ship was laden with the incalculable riches of Imperial colonists, who were doomed to die before they ever reached the new lands they sought.
The discovered ship was laden with the incalculable riches of Imperial colonists, who were doomed to die before they ever reached the new lands they sought.
The discovered ship was laden with the incalculable riches of Imperial colonists, who were doomed to die before they ever reached the new lands they sought.

languages.text: 行商浪人发现的舰船中，装载着帝国殖民者难以计数的财富。然而，这些殖民者还未能踏上新的土地，便已命丧太空。
languages.original_text: The discovered ship was laden with the incalculable riches of Imperial colonists, who were doomed to die before they ever reached the new lands they sought.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人发现的舰船中，装载着帝国殖民者难以计数的财富。然而，这些殖民者还未能踏上新的土地，便已命丧太空。

languages.text: 発見された船には帝国の入植者たちの計り知れない富が積まれていたものの、彼らは新天地に到着する前に死ぬ運命にあった。
languages.original_text: The discovered ship was laden with the incalculable riches of Imperial colonists, who were doomed to die before they ever reached the new lands they sought.

traits.locale_text: 発見された船には帝国の入植者たちの計り知れない富が積まれていたものの、彼らは新天地に到着する前に死ぬ運命にあった。

languages.text: La nave descubierta albergaba las riquezas incalculables de colonos Imperiales condenados a morir antes de llegar a las nuevas tierras que buscaban.
languages.original_text: The discovered ship was laden with the incalculable riches of Imperial colonists, who were doomed to die before they ever reached the new lands they sought.

traits.locale_text: La nave descubierta albergaba las riquezas incalculables de colonos Imperiales condenados a morir antes de llegar a las nuevas tierras que buscaban.

languages.text: Das entdeckte Schiff war mit unermesslichen Reichtümern imperialer Kolonisten beladen, die den Tod fanden, ehe sie die neuen Länder erreichen konnten, nach denen sie gesucht hatten.
languages.original_text: The discovered ship was laden with the incalculable riches of Imperial colonists, who were doomed to die before they ever reached the new lands they sought.

traits.locale_text: Das entdeckte Schiff war mit unermesslichen Reichtümern imperialer Kolonisten beladen, die den Tod fanden, ehe sie die neuen Länder erreichen konnten, nach denen sie gesucht hatten.

languages.text: Le vaisseau trouvé était rempli des innombrables richesses des colons impériaux, dont le destin fut de mourir avant d'atteindre la nouvelle terre qu'ils convoitaient.
languages.original_text: The discovered ship was laden with the incalculable riches of Imperial colonists, who were doomed to die before they ever reached the new lands they sought.

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau trouvé était rempli des innombrables richesses des colons impériaux, dont le destin fut de mourir avant d'atteindre la nouvelle terre qu'ils convoitaient.

languages.text: Keşfedilen gemi, ulaşmaya çalıştıkları yeni diyarlara ulaşamadan önce telef olan İmparatorluk kolonicilerine ait, tarif edilemez zenginliklerle yüklü bir gemiymiş.
languages.original_text: The discovered ship was laden with the incalculable riches of Imperial colonists, who were doomed to die before they ever reached the new lands they sought.

traits.locale_text: Keşfedilen gemi, ulaşmaya çalıştıkları yeni diyarlara ulaşamadan önce telef olan İmparatorluk kolonistlerine ait, tarif edilemez zenginliklerle yüklü bir gemiymiş.
